sentences.en: Another version has Chang'e drink the elixir to keep it from Pang Meng.
sentences.cn: 另一种说法是, 嫦娥 为了不让长生药落入逄蒙之手,便自己喝了下去.

sentences.en: Another version has it that Hou Yi was killed and E drank the elixir herself.
sentences.cn: 另一种版本说后羿被杀,嫦娥就自己喝下灵药.

sentences.en: Contain the plant oil, the cut in fusion elixir, vitamin C, seaweed essence etc.
sentences.cn: 含植物油 、 质溶解剂 、 他命C 、 藻精华等.

sentences.en: Elixir of Camouflage : Imbiber cannot be tracked for 1 hour.
sentences.cn: 难道是强效的隐形药水.1小时的!

sentences.en: Elixir of Major Agility: Increases your Agility by 35 for 1 hour.
sentences.cn: 极效敏捷药剂: 1小时内,提高敏捷35点.

sentences.en: Elixir of Major Armor: Increases armor by 550 for 1 hour.
sentences.cn: 极效防御药剂: 1小时内,护甲提高550.

sentences.en: I told you that I'm not handing out magic elixir.
sentences.cn: 我告诉过你们,我不会将交出魔法万能药水.

sentences.en: Is there an elixir really on the world?
sentences.cn: 世上真的有长生不老药 吗 ?

sentences.en: Keep your mind awake and active; that's the only youth elixir.
sentences.cn: 保持头脑清醒和灵活便是保持年轻的唯一灵丹妙药.

sentences.en: The legend goes that there was a magician who could produce elixir.
sentences.cn: 相传这里曾有位术士能炼长生不老金丹.
